alert.note: Alert for Macon; Putnam (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 05 at 9:18AM CDT until August 06 at 2:48PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall earlier this morning. * WHERE...Portions of north central Missouri and northeast Missouri, including the following counties, in north central Missouri, Linn MO, Macon, Putnam and Sullivan. In northeast Missouri, Adair and Schuyler. * WHEN...Until 1230 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is occurring. Numerous roads remain closed due to flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 917 AM CDT, the transportation department reported several roads closed in the warned area due to heavy rainfall earlier this morning. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Kirksville, Milan, La Plata, Green City, Queen City, Novinger, Greentop, Greencastle, Brashear, Browning, Purdin, Humphreys, Gibbs, Millard, Worthington, Elmer, South Gifford, Green Castle, Winigan and New Boston. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
